entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 8.
